message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision tasks, specifically semantic image segmentation of facial components in video sequences. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The use of deep learning techniques such as ConvLSTM and FCN also suggests that it could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.LG (Machine Learning), or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the proposed loss function and the focus on segmentation accuracy could also place it under cs.GR (Graphics).
